scripts.build:before: cp ../README.md en_US/ && mv zh_CN/index.md zh_CN/README.md && mv en_US/index.md en_US/reference.md
scripts.build:after: mv zh_CN/README.md zh_CN/index.md && rm -rf en_US/README.md && mv en_US/reference.md en_US/index.md
scripts.docs: npm run build:before && gitbook install && gitbook serve
scripts.html: npm run build:before && gitbook install && gitbook build . _book && npm run build:after
scripts.pdf: npm run build:before && gitbook install && gitbook pdf . _book.pdf && npm run build:after
